entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where the narrator and Albus Dumbledore met. (Page 1)

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: A person who was remembered by Elphias Doge. He had a pockmarked visage and greenish hue due to dragon pox, and his father was convicted of attacking three young Muggles. (Page 1-2)

entities.name: elphias doge
entities.description: The author who wrote the article 'ALBUS DUMBLEDORE REMEMBERED'. He met Albus Dumbledore at Hogwarts. (Page 1)

entities.name: percival dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore's father, who was convicted of attacking three young Muggles and later died in Azkaban. (Page 2)

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison where Percival Dumbledore died. (Page 2)

relationships.description: Elphias Doge met Albus Dumbledore at Hogwarts. (Page 1)
Albus Dumbledore's father was Percival Dumbledore, who was convicted of attacking three young Muggles. (Page 2)
Elphias Doge attended Hogwarts, where he met Albus Dumbledore. (Page 1)
